channel.title: How do i add shops to 525
channel.description: Hey title says it all i need help putting shops in Varrock bank as i am making a pk based server, and how do i add items to the store i am making?? Thanks in advance.

item.title: How do i add shops to 525
item.dc:creator: @99range_pure 99range pure
item.description:
@99range_pure wrote:

Well go to your server file and open it.
search for shops.
You should have a big list of shops and a small list of shops.
THE big list is what you want.
the item ID is first then the ammount it will be in there.
like
DCLAWZ - 200k in stock

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add shops to 525
